details.access_and_opening_times:
About us

Visit our profile page for more about the work we do.

Opening hours

Due to security considerations, public access is by appointment only.

Telephone: 9am to 4pm Monday to Friday (excluding public holidays)

Emergency consular assistance following the death, hospitalisation, arrest, or other serious incident involving a British national is available 24 hours by calling +1 613 237 1530

Visa enquiries

  Service not offered at this location

Check if you need a visa or send an enquiry to UK Visas and Immigration.

Passports

  Service not offered at this location

Find out how to apply for a British passport or send an enquiry to Her Majesty’s Passport Office.

Services available by appointment in Ottawa

Make an appointment on-line for the following services, or contact us by telephone for further help.

Make an appointment for an Emergency Travel Document

Make an appointment for a notarial or documentary service

Disabled Access

Our offices are fully equipped with facilities for disabled visitors. If you need special assistance, please contact us before you arrange an appointment.

Press enquiries

Our press team answers media enquiries about the work of the UK government and the British High Commission in Ottawa. We can’t help with passport or visa enquiries.

Media enquiries

Nathan Skolski
80 Elgin Street
Ottawa Ontario K1P 5K7
Canada

Email nathan.skolski@fco.gov.uk

Office +1 613 364 6131

UK Trade and Investment (UKTI)

UKTI helps UK-based companies succeed in the global economy. We also help overseas companies bring their high-quality investment to the UK’s dynamic economy, acknowledged as Europe’s best place from which to succeed in global business.

Public holidays in 2016

On the following public holidays, our office will be closed for normal business. Emergency consular assistance for British nationals is available by telephone.

Date Holiday
Friday 1 January New Year’s Day
Monday 15 February Family Day
Friday 25 March Good Friday
Monday 28 March Easter Monday
Monday 23 May Victoria Day
Friday 1 July Canada Day
Monday 1 August Civic Holiday
Monday 5 September Labour Day
Monday 10 October Thanksgiving
Friday 11 November Remembrance Day
Monday 26 December in lieu of Christmas Day
Tuesday 27 December in lieu of Boxing Day
Wednesday 28 December Christmas Privilege Day

About us

Visit our profile page for more about the work we do.

Opening hours

Due to security considerations, public access is by appointment only.

Telephone: 9am to 4pm Monday to Friday (excluding public holidays)

Emergency consular assistance following the death, hospitalisation, arrest, or other serious incident involving a British national is available 24 hours by calling +1 403 538 2181

Services available by appointment

  There are no services offered to the public at this location

Make an on-line appointment for the following services at our other locations in Canada.

Emergency Travel Documents

Notarial and documentary services

Visa enquiries

  Service not offered at this location.

Check if you need a visa or send an enquiry to UK Visas and Immigration.

Passports

  Service not offered at this location.

Find out how to apply for a British passport or send an enquiry to Her Majesty’s Passport Office.

Disabled Access

Our offices are fully equipped with facilities for disabled visitors. If you need special assistance, please contact us before you arrange an appointment.

Press enquiries

Our press team answers media enquiries about the work of the UK government and the British Consulate General in Calgary. To contact the press team, please call +1 403 705 1755

UK Trade and Investment (UKTI)

UKTI helps UK-based companies succeed in the global economy. We also help overseas companies bring their high-quality investment to the UK’s dynamic economy, acknowledged as Europe’s best place from which to succeed in global business.
